| HistoryText             = The Femizons were mainly enemies of [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], and their goal was to conquer Earth and create a utopia where women ruled over men. Led by Superia, the group was composed of several established female criminals and super villainesses.{{r|Captain America #389|392}}

====Femizons====
* [[Deidre Wentworth (Earth-616)|Superia]] - (Dr. Deidre Wentworth), leader of the Femizons.

===Superia's Lieutenants===
* [[Blackbird (Femizons)|Blackbird]] - (Heather O'Gara), otherwise known as Jackdaw, a [[Hulk]] villainess that had mechanical wings and an array of weaponry.
* [[Iron Maiden (Melina Vostakoff)|Iron Maiden]] - (Melina Vostokoff), a skilled assassin and [[Black Widow]] villainess that wears a metal suit protecting her from physical harm.
* [[Karla Sofen (Earth-616)|Moonstone]] - (Dr. Karla Sofen), villainess with abilities of flight, intangibility, emitting light, and projection of energy blasts.
* [[Tilda Johnson (Earth-616)|Nightshade]] - (Dr. Tilda Johnson), Captain America villainess and second-in-command of the Femizons; mad scientist, has the ability to secrete pheromones.
* [[Sheoke Sanada (Earth-616)|Snapdragon]] - (Sheoke Sanada), martial artist and long-time enemy of Diamondback.
* [[Olinka Barankova (Earth-616)|MODAM]]: a [[MODOK]]-like super-genius created by [[Advanced Idea Mechanics|A.I.M.]], has various psionic abilities.

===Member Overview===
; [[Blanche Sitznski (Earth-616)|Anaconda]]: member of the [[Serpent Society (Earth-616)|Serpent Society]] and [[Six Pack (Earth-616)|Six Pack]], a massive woman with the ability to elongate her limbs, also has super strength to constrict her enemies, the ability to breathe underwater, and super regenerative abilities.
; [[Arclight (Philippa Sontag)|Arclight]]: member of the [[Marauders]], a super-strong woman who creates shockwaves.
; [[Asp (Cleopatra Nefertiti)|Asp]]: former member of the Serpent Society, now a member of [[BAD Girls]], Inc., a snake-charmer that shoots blasts that cause paralysis.
; [[Battleaxe (Anita Ehren)|Battleaxe]]: former Grappler, a muscular woman that uses an axe as her weapon of choice.
; [[Black Lotus (Earth-616)|Black Lotus]]: an Asian assassin and enemy of Black Widow.
; [[Tanya Sealy (Earth-616)|Black Mamba]]: former member of the Serpent Society, now a member of BAD Girls, Inc., has the ability to pluck the image of her victim's loved one and use Darkforce to embody that person, eventually suffocating them.
; [[Beatta Dubiel (Earth-616)|Bloodlust]]: ferocious member of the [[Femme Fatales]]; has enhanced strength, speed, agility, and senses.
; [[Wendy Conrad (Earth-616)|Bombshell]]: Hawkeye enemy, expert juggler that uses explosives.
; [[Chimera (Femizons)|Chimera]]: a metamorph that can grow wings and claws.
; [[Dansen Macabre (Earth-616)|Dansen Macabre]]: a hypnotist that kills her victims by dancing.
; [[Diamondback (Rachel Leighton)]]: former member of the Serpent Society, now a member of BAD Girls, Inc., throws diamonds laced with a variety of chemicals (acid, poison), ex-girlfriend of Captain America.
; [[Dragonfly (Veronica Dultry)|Dragonfly]]: villainess with flight and hypnotic abilities, former member of the [[Masters of Evil]].
; [[Fera (Earth-616)|Ferocia]]: furred, clawed woman with super senses.
; [[Frenzy (Joanna Cargill)|Frenzy]]: super-strong mutant with steel-hard skin, member of the [[Alliance of Evil]], [[Acolytes]], and [[X-Men]].
; [[Robin Braxton (Earth-616)|Gladiatrix]]: member of the [[Grapplers]] and a professional wrestler with super strength.
; [[Angela Golden (Earth-616)|Golddigger]]: Captain America villain that has no super powers; relies on her feminine charm.
; [[Sybil Dvorak (Earth-616)|Gypsy Moth]]: former [[Thunderbolts|Thunderbolt]] with the ability to fly and manipulate various organic objects. (More recently known as ''Skein'').
; [[Ice Princess (Earth-616)|Ice Princess]]: villainess with the ability to control ice.
; [[Impala (Earth-616)|Impala]]: African javelin thrower, former member of [[BAD Girls]], Inc.
; [[Voletta Todd (Earth-616)|Ion]]: [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]] character, projects electromagnetic energy.
; [[Mary Brown (Karisma) (Earth-616)|Karisma]]: Fantastic Four villainess that uses radiation wavelengths to become irresistible to men.
; [[Elizabeth Rawson (Earth-616)|Knockout]]: Femme Fatale and [[Spider-Man]] villainess, a super-strong woman.
; [[Danielle Forte (Earth-616)|Mindblast]]: Femme Fatale with telekinetic abilities.
; [[Mysteria Winters (Earth-616)|Mysteria]]: a villainess that uses mist as her weapon.
; [[Pearl Gross (Earth-616)|Pink Pearl]]: [[Alpha Flight]] villainess, an obese woman with above-average strength.
; [[Marian Pouncy (Earth-616)|Poundcakes]]: member of the Grapplers that creates tremors with her boots.
; [[Zelda DuBois (Earth-616)|Princess Python]]: former member of the Serpent Society and [[Circus of Crime (Earth-616)|Circus of Crime]], a villainess that uses a pet boa constrictor as her weapon.
; [[Quicksand (Nguyet) (Earth-616)|Quicksand]]: former member of the Masters of Evil, a woman with super strength and the ability to turn her body into sand.
; [[Melissa Gold (Earth-616)|Screaming Mimi]]: member of the Thunderbolts, creates physical sound constructs. (More recently known also as ''Songbird''.)
; [[Ruriko Tsumura (Earth-616)|Steel Wind]]: [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider]] villainess, a cyborg with enhanced strength and durability.
; [[Mary MacPherran (Earth-616)|Titania]]: villainess with super strength and durability, wife of the [[Carl Creel (Earth-616)|Absorbing Man]].
; [[Ann Darnell (Earth-616)|Vapor]]: member of the [[U-Foes (Earth-616)|U-Foes]], can transform into any gaseous matter.
; [[Vertigo (Savage Land Mutate) (Earth-616)|Vertigo]]: member of the [[Savage Land Mutates (Earth-616)|Savage Land Mutates]] and Marauders, a mutate with the ability to cause nausea or disorientation.
; [[Water Witch (Earth-616)|Water Witch]]: servant of the [[Harvey Elder (Earth-616)|Mole Man]], a woman that can control water.
; [[Leeann Foreman (Earth-616)|Whiplash]]: Femme Fatale, villainess with whips extending from her gloves.
; [[Whiteout (Earth-616)|Whiteout]]: Savage Land Mutate with the ability to project beams of light, often blinding her enemies.
; [[Wrangler (Laralie) (Earth-616)|Wrangler]]: Black Widow villainess that uses cowboy-themed weapons.
; [[Rita DeMara|Yellowjacket]]: an initial [[Avengers]] enemy and later member of both the Avengers and [[Guardians of the Galaxy]], who could shrink her body and also project bioelectric blasts.
